mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ndk_file (id, disk_id, folder_id, name, size, type, kind, create_time, resource_id) select #{et.id}, #{et.diskId}, #{et.folderId}, #{et.name}, #{et.size}, #{et.type}, #{et.kind}, now(), (SELECT id FROM `ndk_resource` WHERE md5 = #{md5}) from dual where NOT EXISTS (select name, type from ndk_file where name = #{et.name} and type = #{et.type})
